SEARCH

Class Model

java.lang.Object
Model
public class Model extends Object
The Model class represents the model component of the application. It contains the properties, arrays, and methods necessary for managing the game state and communication with the network. This class handles initializing the host or client, sending and receiving messages over the network, converting arrays to strings and vice versa, loading the game board and theme images, and validating moves in multiplayer and help mode.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String strUsername, String strDesignationID, String strRoleID, String strActionID, String strParam1, String strParam2, String strParam3)
      Sends a message to the network with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      strUsername - Username of the sender
      strDesignationID - Designation number of the recipient (0 - Host, 1 - Client)
      strRoleID - Role number of the sender (0 - Spectator, 1 - Red, 2 - Black)
      strActionID - Action number for recipient to perform
      strParam1 - First parameter of the message
      strParam2 - Second parameter of the message
      strParam3 - Third parameter of the message
